feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:23 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
